sprint_goal: Establish the foundational user onboarding and authentication flows by implementing the Registration and Login UIs.
Build the core profile viewing experience and complete the session lifecycle with a secure logout.
Enable users to build their professional identity by implementing full CRUD functionality for all profile sections.
Implement the core networking loop (send, view, and manage connection requests) and ensure the application is fully responsive.
Launch content creation capabilities with rich post features and build the foundational real-time notification system.
Deliver the primary content consumption experience by building the news feed with full interaction capabilities.
Launch real-time direct messaging and ensure the entire application meets WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards. (Note: This is a high point count and might need to be split).
